architectural_elements.name: Wooden Crib
architectural_elements.description: An old, creaky crib with a mobile of broken toys hanging above. The sheets are stained or tattered.

architectural_elements.name: Rocking Chair
architectural_elements.description: A wooden rocking chair that moves on its own, covered in dust and cobwebs.

architectural_elements.name: Toy Chest
architectural_elements.description: A large, ornate chest filled with broken or eerie toys. The lid may creak or slam shut unexpectedly.

architectural_elements.name: Small Table and Chairs
architectural_elements.description: A tiny wooden table with mismatched chairs, covered in dust and scribbles.

architectural_elements.name: Bookshelf
architectural_elements.description: A low bookshelf filled with children’s books, some with disturbing illustrations or missing pages.

furniture_and_decor.name: Stuffed Animals
furniture_and_decor.description: Old, tattered stuffed animals with button eyes, some positioned unnaturally or missing parts.

furniture_and_decor.name: Dolls
furniture_and_decor.description: Porcelain or cloth dolls with cracked faces or missing limbs, some positioned to watch the player.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wooden Blocks
furniture_and_decor.description: Scattered wooden blocks with letters or numbers, some arranged to spell ominous words.

furniture_and_decor.name: Music Box
furniture_and_decor.description: A wind-up music box that plays a haunting melody when opened.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wall Decals
furniture_and_decor.description: Faded or peeling decals of animals, stars, or children’s drawings, some with disturbing details.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Thick cobwebs draped across the crib, rocking chair, and toy chest.

atmospheric_details.name: Dust Particles
atmospheric_details.description: Floating in the air, visible in shafts of light or moonlight.

atmospheric_details.name: Flickering Lights
atmospheric_details.description: A dim, flickering nightlight or candle casting eerie shadows.

atmospheric_details.name: Ghostly Laughter
atmospheric_details.description: Faint giggles, whispers, or the sound of a child singing a nursery rhyme.

atmospheric_details.name: Cold Spots
atmospheric_details.description: Areas in the room that feel unnaturally cold, especially near the crib or rocking chair.

interactive_objects.name: Children's Drawings
interactive_objects.description: Crayon drawings on the walls or table, depicting disturbing scenes or hidden clues.

interactive_objects.name: Broken Toy
interactive_objects.description: A toy with a missing part or a mechanism that activates a secret compartment or puzzle.

interactive_objects.name: Locket or Small Box
interactive_objects.description: A tiny locket or box hidden in the toy chest or under the crib, containing a photograph or note.

interactive_objects.name: Storybook
interactive_objects.description: A children’s book with a dark twist or a hidden message within its pages.

interactive_objects.name: Wind-Up Key
interactive_objects.description: A key for the music box or a mechanical toy, possibly tied to a puzzle.

environmental_effects.name: Drafts
environmental_effects.description: Curtains or the rocking chair moving as if pushed by an unseen force.

environmental_effects.name: Fog
environmental_effects.description: A thin layer of mist near the floor, adding to the eerie atmosphere.

environmental_effects.name: Handprints
environmental_effects.description: Small, ghostly handprints on the walls, crib, or windows.

environmental_effects.name: Falling Dust or Ash
environmental_effects.description: Dust or ash drifting down from the ceiling or shelves.

lighting.name: Moonlight
lighting.description: Streaming through the windows, casting long, eerie shadows across the room.

lighting.name: Nightlight
lighting.description: A dim, flickering nightlight or candle, creating a ghostly ambiance.

lighting.name: Fireplace Glow
lighting.description: A faint, ghostly glow from a nearby fireplace, even if it's not lit.
